file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Piggy Metrics Gateway APIs
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /api/accounts:
    post:
      operationId: add
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
      responses:
        default:
          description: default response
  /api/accounts/current:
    get:
      operationId: getCurrent
      responses:
        default:
          description: default response
    put:
      operationId: updateCurrent
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Account'
      responses:
        default:
          description: default response
  /api/auth/login:
    post:
      operationId: loginUser
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
      responses:
        default:
          description: default response
components:
  schemas:
    Account:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        lastSeen:
          type: string
        incomes:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Item'
        expenses:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Item'
        saving:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Saving'
        note:
          type: string
    Item:
      type: object
      properties:
        title:
          type: string
        amount:
          type: number
        currency:
          type: string
          enum:
          - USD
          - EUR
          - RUB
        period:
          type: string
          enum:
          - YEAR
          - QUARTER
          - MONTH
          - DAY
          - HOUR
        icon:
          type: string
    User:
      type: object
      properties:
        username:
          type: string
        password:
          type: string
    Saving:
      type: object
      properties:
        amount:
          type: number
        currency:
          type: string
          enum:
          - USD
          - EUR
          - RUB
        interest:
          type: number
        deposit:
          type: boolean
        capitalization:
          type: boolean
  securitySchemes:
    BearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
security:
- BearerAuth: []
